title: Privacy Policy | Mobilize
content:
Last updated on February 10, 2023

Bonterra LLC (“Bonterra”) is an online, cloud-based service platform that provides individuals and organizations the ability to contribute to, organize, and manage their causes (collectively, the “Services”). Bonterra Services include EveryAction, Mobilize, CyberGrants, Network for Good, Social Solutions and the respective individualized service offerings thereunder.

Read our full Privacy Policy
